isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - PRESSURE RELIEF VALVE

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The system pressure relief valve protects the air brake system against excessive air pressure. Should the air pressure in the air brake system rise above 150 psi, the valve opens and permits excess pressure to be exhausted. It is located on the supply reservoir.
